snippet.title: SiN Episodes: Emergence (2006) | 4K60 | Longplay Full Game Walkthrough No Commentary
snippet.description:
Full game longplay of SiN Episodes: Emergence, ironically the first and only Episode to ever come out, making this a standalone one-time game. Developed and published by Ritual Entertainment for the PCs (Steam focused mostly, as it runs on Source engine). Here played is the Steam version of the game, updated etc., running at 4K60 highest possible details, with FOV pushed higher during gameplay through a console command. Recorded at 4K60 H.265 HEVC.

Heavily focused on sexy women, lots of shooting, violence, drugs, dystopian corpo-ruled world.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1300/SiN_Episodes_Emergence/

My longplay of the Xbox Half Life 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=extHj96R75k

Freeport City is a bustling, futuristic megacity with a population of 27,000,000 and described as a mix of New York, San Francisco, and Tokyo. Areas that are featured in Emergence include the Freeport Docks, Sintek Supremacy Tower, and Radek's hidden drugs lab on board a beached, derelict oil tanker.




























=====================================================================================
